mapper.select: SELECT T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD , T1.PRTNR_NO , T2.PRTNR_KNM , T4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T4.MEXNO_ENCR , T4.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T3.BLD_NM , T5.CNTR_NO || '-' || T5.CNTR_SN AS CNTR , T7.RCGVP_KNM , T9.PD_NM , T10.NEW_ADR_ZIP , T10.RNADR || ' ' || T10.RDADR AS ADR , T11.VST_FSH_DSTN_VAL , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T11.VST_FSH_DT || T11.VST_FSH_HH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS VST_FSH_DT_HH , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.RCPDT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCPDT , T12.USR_NM FROM TB_SVPD_BFSVC_FS_VST_RGST_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T2 ON T2.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.FST_RGST_DTM,1,6) AND T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T4 ON T4.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T4.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T5 ON T5.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T6 ON T6.DTL_CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T6.DTL_CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN AND T6.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T6.VL_STRT_DTM AND T6.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T7 ON T7.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T6.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T8 ON T8.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T8.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T9 ON T9.PD_CD = T8.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T10 ON T10.ADR_ID = T7.ADR_ID INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T11 ON T11.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M T12 ON (T12.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID OR T12.EPNO = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID) WHERE SUBSTR(T1.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
